thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ServiceNow Reports Quarterly Loss Per Share $0.16

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ServiceNow Reports Quarterly Loss Per Share $0.16
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - ServiceNow Inc:
* SERVICENOW REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017
* GAAP SUBSCRIPTION REVENUES OF $497 MILLION IN Q4 2017, REPRESENTING 44% YEAR-OVER-YEAR GROWTH
* QUARTERLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.16 * QUARTERLY NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.35 * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $546.4 MILLION VERSUS $385.7 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.35, REVENUE VIEW $534.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QUARTERLY NON-GAAP TOTAL REVENUES UP 38% TO $531.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
